overview: Porto (Portugal), beginning of the 80s. A film crew seeks to understand if there's really the figure of Chico Fininho, immortalized in the popular song of the same name. A bunch of people are interviewed taking us to Boavista - where we find him in a club.  After a brief hesitation, the interview happens and we're taken to everyday situations, that can happen to any "freak" of the city...
title: Chico Fininho
